alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near World Golf Village, or 7 miles southeast of Fruit Cove, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, half inch hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Fruit Cove, Jacksonville Beach, World Golf Village, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Durbin, Palm Valley, South Ponte Vedra and Bayard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jacksonville. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
